_comment: Default skills for shared_skills/. Only includes superpowers skills that work in Cursor (no parallel dispatch, no plugin-system meta). Sources: superpowers (obra/superpowers), plugin (claw-core), custom (templates/skills/).

skills.name: brainstorming
skills.description: Socratic design refinement — use before any creative work

skills.name: verification-before-completion
skills.description: Verify work is actually done before claiming complete

skills.name: writing-skills
skills.description: Create new skills following best practices

skills.name: claw-core-workspace
skills.description: How to work within the claw_core workspace

skills.name: model-selection-agent
skills.description: Select models for agent use — free + tool calling criteria

_skipped._comment: Superpowers skills excluded because they don't apply in Cursor
_skipped.dispatching-parallel-agents: Cursor has no parallel agent dispatch — use Task tool or sequential steps instead
_skipped.subagent-driven-development: Cursor does not spawn subagents — agent performs implementer + reviewer steps sequentially (covered by executing-plans)
_skipped.using-superpowers: Meta intro to the superpowers system — redundant when skills are already in shared_skills/
